name: Zapper (itch) (-Tex-, JulesTex, JojoLeCamion)
description:
You are in the skin of a yung man, and suddenly while you are watching tv, she grab you and you pass threw the screen.

You are now trapped into a TV by a named "The Trickster", only way to get out, reolve all the enigmas, and to help you you have a special remote who can rewind the past and eject object (rewind(left click) (eject(right click)

The movment keys are WASD

Q to crouch

We use Asset Forge for modeling

PS: Special thanks to @pikevchu for his dialog tools dev during an old jam <3
